name: Munchem Menu
author: Munchem.com

sections.description:
You have a 200+ Menu Items which frequently gets their price updated.

We got you. Here is the plugin you need to easily display your Restaurant Menu in your WordPress website.

MunchEm Menu Plugin works with MunchEm API. So, every price change/ Menu change Will be easily updated with the plugin.

MunchEm has a list of thousands of restaurants in their list. So, Its too easy for your restaurant to join and start a growth ride.
sections.installation:
Before installing you need to have the required permissions( such as API keys) from the MunchEm Inc.

This plugin only works with the MunchEm API keys.

The plugin needs PHP version of Minimum 5.3 and WordPress version of 4.0.

This plugins calls an API call through POST method and gets the required menu information to display on MENU page of the wordpress site.

This Plugin is working with a third party API (www.eloudbiz.com) to get the restaurant menu details.

This is the link to the third party API service : https://ecloudbiz.com/services/

This is the link to terms & conditions : https://www.munchem.com/TermsofUse.aspx

This is the link to Privacy Policy : https://www.munchem.com/PrivacyPolicy.aspx
